name: Henry PASCARELLA et al. v. Robert SILVER et al.

parties:
Henry PASCARELLA et al.
v.
Robert SILVER et al.
attorneys: The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40537) is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Henry PASCARELLA et al.
v.
Robert SILVER et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided October 25, 2017
Wesley W. Horton and Scott T. Garosshen, in support of the petition.
Hugh D. Hughes, in opposition.
The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40537) is denied.
